org.melior.jdbc.dao

Class DataAccessObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.component.core.ServiceComponent
      • org.melior.jdbc.dao.DataAccessObject

  • public abstract class DataAccessObject
extends org.melior.component.core.ServiceComponent
    Base class for DAO implementations. Provides helper functions that make writing JDBC code simpler and more resilient.
    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Melior

      • getTimestampAsString

        protected String getTimestampAsString(ResultSet resultSet,
                                      int columnIndex,
                                      String defaultValue)
                               throws SQLException
        Returns the value of the specified Timestamp column in the result set as a String. If the column is SQL NULL, then the default value is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        resultSet - The result set
        columnIndex - The column index
        defaultValue - The default value
        Returns:
        The value as a String, if the column is not SQL NULL, otherwise the default value
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the column index is not valid, if a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed result set

      • getTimestampAsLocal

        protected LocalDateTime getTimestampAsLocal(ResultSet resultSet,
                                            int columnIndex)
                                     throws SQLException
        Returns the value of the specified Timestamp column in the result set as a LocalDateTime. If the column is SQL NULL, then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        resultSet - The result set
        columnIndex - The column index
        Returns:
        The value as a LocalDateTime, if the column is not SQL NULL, otherwise null
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the column index is not valid, if a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed result set

      • getSystemTimestamp

        protected Timestamp getSystemTimestamp(Connection connection)
                                throws SQLException
        Returns the current system date and time. If a statement enhancer is enabled, then the system date and time is retrieved from the database to which the connection is connected, otherwise the system date and time is generated from the local time source.
        Parameters:
        connection - The database connection
        Returns:
        The system date
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs

                                 int columnIndex,

                          throws SQLException
